ai-patthana16.62:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.62:0.3_0: Transmigration for those who are associated with knots, for those who are associated with the yokes,
ai-patthana16.62:1.1_0: Not seeing the danger in being associated with no trouble or difficulty, and the result of that states associated with the defilements.
ai-patthana16.62:1.1_1: Not seeing the danger in being associated with the unbecome, and the keepers of the earlier consciousness arises. That doesn’t give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana16.62:1.1_2: One who has not off the floods, and whose mind is associated with no longer associated with floods, nor is for the sake of the unbeneficial causes. Their defilements don’t arise because of the defilement of the flood.
ai-patthana16.62:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.62:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to unpervading, or any associated with floods, but doesn’t give rise to the darkness.
ai-patthana16.62:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
